column1: 452216,Trekking Guide,,"Participate in or lead outdoor adventure activities
column5: Monitor activities of individuals to ensure safety or compliance with rules
column9: Apply knowledge, understanding and respect of culturally significant sites or objects
column13: Communicate safety or hazard information to others
column15: Maintain practical knowledge of natural areas
column17: Gather information in order to provide services to clients
column19: Identify and use geographic or hydrographic features or landmarks to assist with navigation
column23: Advise and answer questions on historically, culturally or environmentally relevant local interest points
column27: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column29: Communicate with others to coordinate activities
column33: Inspect equipment to ensure safety or proper functioning
column35: Determine methods to minimise environmental impact of activities
column37: Demonstrate activity techniques or equipment use
column39: Notify others of emergencies, problems or hazards
column41: Determine equipment, food and supplies required for journey
column51: Monitor availability of equipment or supplies
